description.p: This ballot package contains the application modules that correspond to conformance classes for ISO 10303-221 'Functional data and schematic representation for process plant'. The conformance classes are:

dl.dd: which supports the definition of objects within a process plant and their relationships, and supports the representation of these objects on a schematic drawing;
which supports the definition of a library of classes for objects within a procreof object, and for relationships between these objects.
